message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10,000. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  $10,000 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to spend closer to $9,000.  Let me know what you think.

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand where you're coming from, but I'm not comfortable going as low as $9,000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle and offer you the product for $9,500. It's a great compromise, if I do say so myself.
